verses.name: 1 Samuel 15:28
verses.text: And Samuel said unto him, The Lord hath rent the kingdom of Israel from thee this day, and hath given it to a neighbour of thine, that is better than thou.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 15:29
verses.text: And also the Strength of Israel will not lie nor repent: for he is not a man, that he should repent.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 15:30
verses.text: Then he said, I have sinned: yet honour me now, I pray thee, before the elders of my people, and before Israel, and turn again with me, that I may worship the Lord thy God.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 15:31
verses.text: So Samuel turned again after Saul; and Saul worshipped the Lord.
